{"icon":"https://alipass.alipay.com/temps/groupon/icon.png","logo":"https://alipass.alipay.com/temps/groupon/logo.png","strip":"https://alipass.alipay.com/temps/groupon/strip.png","content":{"evoucherInfo":{"title":"聚划算团购券","startDate":"","endDate":"","type":"coupon","product":"groupon","operation":[{"altText":"45612346579465","format":"qrcode","message":"45612346579465","messageEncoding":"UTF-8"},{"altText":"45612346579465","format":"barcode","message":"45612346579465","messageEncoding":"UTF-8"}],"remindInfo":{"offset":2},"einfo":{"logoText":"聚划算团购券","headFields":[{"key":"status","label":"状态","value":"可使用"}],"primaryFields":null,"secondaryFields":[{"key":"indro","label":"","value":"仅售58元！享最高价值168元自助茶套餐"}],"auxiliaryFields":null,"backFields":[{"key":"bus","label":"使用限制","value":"1.杭州8家门店通用，烟、酒水、扑克、餐巾纸等不在自助餐范围内
2.请至少提前1天致电各分店预约，可使用大厅及普通包厢，2人以上可预约普通包间（豪华包厢除外），预约为您保留30分钟
3.仅限堂食，不提供打包服务
4.每人不限购买张数，可多买几张赠送好友，每桌不限使用张数，每张券仅限1人使用
5.一位家长仅限带一名免费儿童，1米以下儿童免费，1米-1.4米半价(店内支付现金），1.4米以上视同成人
6.每个ID不限购买份数，只发送一条短信，短信内的验证码可验证次数就是您购买的份数，送亲朋好友转发短信即可"},{"key":"shops","label":"使用流程","value":"团购成功后会收到短信(团购券) -> 提前致电预约-> 凭验证信息消费","type":""},{"key":"tel","label":"","value":"87651396","type":"tel"},{"key":"tel2","label":"","value":"87651397","type":"tel"},{"key":"shops2","label":"","value":"可用门店","type":""},{"key":"bField6","label":"定安店","value":"上城区定安路27号银泰百货2楼","type":"map"},{"key":"bField7","label":"凤起店","value":"下城区建国北路285号双牛大厦2楼","type":"map"},{"key":"bField8","label":"黄龙店","value":"西湖区黄龙路5号恒励大厦E座2楼","type":"map"},{"key":"bField9","label":"香积寺店","value":"拱墅区香积寺路34-36号三塘竹苑2楼","type":"map"}]}},"style":{"backgroundColor":"RGB(0,152,189)"},"fileInfo":{"canShare":true,"formatVersion":"2","serialNumber":"$serialNumber$"},"merchant":{"mname":"$mname$","mtel":"","minfo":""},"platform":{"channelID":"$channelID$","webServiceUrl":"$webServiceUrl$"},"appInfo":{"label":"聚划算APP","message":"点击调起APP","app":{"ios_launch":"jhs://","android_appid":"com.taobao.ju.android","android_download":"http://rj.m.taobao.com/wap/appmark/app_detail.htm?appID=18626","ios_download":"itms-apps://ax.itunes.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewSoftware?id=534159732","android_launch":"com.taobao.ju.android://alipay","ios_appid":"jhs://"}}}}
